# AVAudioSession.CategoryOptions

**Structure**

Constants that specify optional audio behaviors.

## Declaration

```swift
struct CategoryOptions
```

## Overview

Each option is valid only for specific audio session categories.

## Category options

- **allowAirPlay**: An option that determines whether you can stream audio from this session to AirPlay devices.
- **allowBluetooth**: An option that determines whether Bluetooth hands-free devices appear as available input routes.
- **allowBluetoothA2DP**: An option that determines whether you can stream audio from this session to Bluetooth devices that support the Advanced Audio Distribution Profile (A2DP).
- **allowBluetoothHFP**: An option that makes Bluetooth Hands-Free Profile (HFP) devices available for audio input.
- **bluetoothHighQualityRecording**: An option that indicates to enable high-quality audio for input and output routes.
- **defaultToSpeaker**: An option that determines whether audio from the session defaults to the built-in speaker instead of the receiver.
- **duckOthers**: An option that reduces the volume of other audio sessions while audio from this session plays.
- **farFieldInput**: This option should be used if a session prefers to use FarFieldInput when available. This option is only valid with categories that support input - [doc://com.apple.avfaudio/documentation/AVFAudio/AVAudioSession/Category-swift.struct/playAndRecord] and [doc://com.apple.avfaudio/documentation/AVFAudio/AVAudioSession/Category-swift.struct/record].
- **interruptSpokenAudioAndMixWithOthers**: An option that determines whether to pause spoken audio content from other sessions when your app plays its audio.
- **mixWithOthers**: An option that indicates whether audio from this session mixes with audio from active sessions in other audio apps.
- **overrideMutedMicrophoneInterruption**: An option that indicates whether the system interrupts the audio session when it mutes the built-in microphone.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**: Creates a new instance with the raw value you specify.

## Inspecting the category configuration

- **category**: The current audio session category.
- **availableCategories**: The audio session categories available on the current device.
- **AVAudioSession.Category**: Audio session category identifiers.
- **categoryOptions**: The set of options associated with the current audio session category.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- ExpressibleByArrayLiteral
- OptionSet
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
- SetAlgebra
